attributes.additional_details:
I was a soldier for 3 years and a Police Officer for 25 years. I am currently working as a Court Custody Officer in Northern Ireland aged 60.
I was shocked to see that fallen members of the armed forces no longer driven through Royal Wooton Bassett so that people cannot show their respects. It appears to me that the MOD want to repatriate fallen members via a back door.
REPATRIATE THEM THROUGH ROYAL WOOTON BASSETT
